Schindibee's fictional sight for Flakpanzer I "Gepard"

#customsight #sight #fictional #gepard #flakpz_i

This is a fully fictional sight for the Gepard, somewhat inspired by some aircrafts gun sights. Featured are scales for the Anti-Air belts (right) as well as for the APDS ammo (right).

Installation:

1) Copy contained folder \UserSights\ into your main WT-folder \War Thunder\.

2) Go to test Drive (reccommended anyway to try out the sights)...

3) Once in test drive, press Alt + F9 to reload sights...

4) Go to options, and under tank options select the desired sight variant

Disclaimer:

Hi, All,

Actually this is not only gun sights, also include all basic technic. However, all slides are in Chinese. just try your best to read images if you unable understand Chinese.

TPD sights pack for T-64A, T-72A, T-72B and T-72AV
- TPD-K1/TPD-K1M laser rangefinder sight upgraded with Polish made electronic SKO-1M "DRAWA" FCS
- TPD-K1/TPD-K1M laser rangefinder sight
- TPD-2-49 coincidence rangefinder sight for T-64A

Version 2021.07.27
- Compatible with 2.7.0.131
- Fixed font scale.
- OF-26 range spinner better following game ballistics also at long range.
- Set the FOV blocker further down so that range display is better visible.
- Moved rangefinder, sight setting and ...
Dotted sight for any purpose. Comes with a variant with range marks.

PLEASE NOTE: Gaijins is constantly changing magnification in m1 tank series. Sometimes it is3-10x OR 8-12x. I will add sights for all this variants as soon as possible to encounter this. Sorry for inconvenience. Now it works fine. Dunno for how long.

So, @SGTEAGLE and @OkamiSenpai was asking about this sight for #m1a1 #m1a1_abrams
Instead of just one sight i created 3 of them in 4 variations each! You can choose between:
3x zoom HFOM for both rounds,
3x zoom without HFOM for both rounds,
3x zoom HFOM with historical layout for both rounds (crosshair lighting not recommended),
10x zoom HFOM f

#Sight
#toptier
#leopard2

Simple and clear Sight that I made for myself some time ago. No fancy vertical lines, no useless information, just 1/2/3 kilometer lines with 200m notches.

Two aditional notches below 3km are 4/5km, sometimes useful against Helicopters.

Used mainly on Leopards 2, but should work well on any other tank.

На половину исторический прицел для т80у

Three gun sights,
1, For optics 3x~8x zoom, ussr tanks, T55AM,T80B......
2, For optics 8x~12x zoom, US, German tanks: XM-1, Leopard 2a4.....
3,For optics 3x~12x zoom, US, German tanks: m1,XM-803,MBT 70, LEO 1

/////////////How to install/////////////
Before you install any gunsights. You need to create a Usersights folder. Proceedure are:
1,Log-in game, Select your tank(Eg XM-1 here), right click to test drive.

2,Press escape key, before you confirm to ESC, select Options.>>Tank battle settings>>Use alternative sight grid>>add a grid sight. The gun sight folder of this tank will be created

British tier VI MBT sights

New version of my fictional sight model. At the moment is only avaliable to tier 6 MBTs but soon will be released to tier 5 and tier 4 also. Some minor visual tweaks has been did and a parallax correction was added for SB. Two reticles are avaliable. The upper parallax correction line matches the kinect ammo and the lower matches the HESH ammo.

Hope you enjoy :)

#leopard #leopard2 #leopard2a4 #leopard2a5 #strv121 #strv122 #historical

Представляю вашему вниманию — минималистичный прицел для топовых танков. Он заточен на стрельбу по целям на большом отдалении, для этого он имеет:
1) Тонкие риски, которые не будут перекрывать цель, чей силуэт будет очень мал на дистанции.
2) Разметка до 6000м.
3) Контрастная подсветка "определения дальности".
4) Позволяет комфортно вести ПТУР/ТУРС до цели.

На советских Т-64/72/80 выглядит достаточно неплохо, но на танках с большой кратностью прицела может казаться слишком мелким.

realistic sight for AMX 10 RC

small adaptation for the game due to the absence of COTAC (distance and correction display).
You can use the sight with "standard sniper view" or with "gunner's optics view"

Zip file contain:
-Folder of amx10RC
-sight file

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915

Look the screen with drawnings on that post for learn the indication and how use the sight

Sight for Leopard 2K Прицел для Leopard 2K

Lines closer to the crosshair are extended in accordance with the shooting at tanks for long distances. More distant lines are lengthened for more convenient shooting at helicopters. Also increased the maximum sighting distance for sub-caliber projectiles. Added decorative elements and lines on the right for a quick estimate of the range of the height of technology.

Риски ближе к перекрестию удлинены в соответствии со стрельбой по танкам на дальние дистанции. Более дальние риски удлинены для более удобной стрельбы по вертолётам. Так же увеличена мак

#bmp_1
#sight
#semihistorical

sight at the semihistorical bmp1 (not easy to use for game reasons) forced to use "sight distance control" I hope you like it,
I did not put the "he" of the left place, because in the game it has double the fall and they do not match the sight.

font: https://thesovietarmourblog.blogspot.com/2017/03/field-disassembly-bmp-1.html

Universal sight for all tanks

If you want to change the thickness of the lines:

lineSizeMult:r = 1.25

If you want to change the font size:

fontSizeMult:r = 0.75

If you want to hide unnecessary distance use "//" :

// distance {distance:: ........ = 3400, 0, 0;}
// distance {textPos: ........ = 3600, 36, 0;}
// distance {distance: ........ = 3800, 0, 0;}
// distance {textPos: ........ = 4000, 40, 0;}

If you want to change the length of the lines:

line {line:p4 = -10, 0, 0.0, 0; .......... es;} - Left
line {line:p4 = 10, 0, 0.0, 0; ........... es;} - Right
line {line:p4 = 0, 100, 0.0, 0; ..
